mapper.select: SELECT MF15.MF15_COMPANY /*회사*/ ,MF15.MF15_FACTORY /*공장*/ ,MF15.MF15_NO /*사급지시서번호*/ ,MF15.MF15_DAT /*사급지시일자*/ ,MF15.MF15_SEQ /*순번*/ ,MF15.MF15_CUS /*제조사코드*/ ,CM01.CM01_NAME /*제조사명*/ ,MF15.MF15_INDTE /*등록일자*/ ,MF15.MF15_EMPNO /*등록자사번*/ ,MF13.MF13_NO ,MF13.MF13_DAT ,MF13.MF13_REV ,MF13.MF13_SEQ ,MF13.MF13_REV ,MF13.MF13_LINE_CODE ,CAST(MF13.MF13_INDTE AS DATE) as MF13_INDTE ,MF13.MF13_EMPNO ,MF13.MF13_DAT_TIME FROM TB_MF_15 MF15 LEFT JOIN TB_MF_13 MF13 ON MF15.MF15_COMPANY = MF13.MF13_COMPANY AND MF15.MF15_FACTORY = MF13.MF13_FACTORY AND MF15.MF15_NO = MF13.MF13_NO LEFT JOIN TB_CM_01 CM01 ON MF15.MF15_COMPANY = CM01.CM01_COMPANY AND MF15.MF15_FACTORY = CM01.CM01_FACTORY AND MF15.MF15_CUS = CM01.CM01_CODE ORDER BY MF15.MF15_INDTE DESC
